code: import React,{useContext,useEffect,useState}from'react';import{useParams}from'react-router-dom';import{ContextGlobal}from'../Components/utils/global.context';import"../Styles/Detail.css";import{jsxs as _jsxs,jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Detail=()=>{const{id}=useParams();const{state}=useContext(ContextGlobal);const[dentist,setDentist]=useState(null);useEffect(()=>{const selectedDentist=state.data.find(d=>d.id===parseInt(id));setDentist(selectedDentist);},[id,state.data]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:state.theme==="dark"?"dark detail-container":"detail-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h1",{children:["Detail Dentist ",id]}),dentist&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"detail-grid",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"header",children:"Name"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"header",children:"Email"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"header",children:"Phone"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"header",children:"Website"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:dentist.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:dentist.email}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:dentist.phone}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:dentist.website})]})]});};export default Detail;
